articles.author: Jill Lawless, Pan Pylas
articles.title: Britain gets a defense boost aimed at sending a message to Russia, and to Trump - AP News
articles.description: The U.K. will build new nuclear-powered attack submarines and create an army ready to fight a war in Europe as part of a boost to military spending. It's designed to send a message to Moscow — and Washington. The government announced the moves Monday in respo…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) The United Kingdom will build new nuclear-powered attack submarines, get its army ready to fight a war in Europe and become a battle-ready, armor-clad nation, Prime Minister Keir Starmer … [+4911 chars]
